abstract: Deutsche Bank and Sankaty Advisors , a Bain Capital affiliate, were selected as the final bidder for the commercial lending and leasing businesses.
snippet: Deutsche Bank and Sankaty Advisors , a Bain Capital affiliate, were selected as the final bidder for the commercial lending and leasing businesses.
lead_paragraph: SYDNEY, Australia — GE Capital is in talks to sell its Australian commercial lending and leasing businesses to Sankaty Advisors and Deutsche Bank, said a person with direct knowledge of the matter, the last of a series of auctions of General Electric’s Australian financial assets this year that have included consumer lending and fleet-financing.

headline.main: GE Capital Said to Be in Talks to Sell Australian Businesses
